metadata.title: CVE-2015-7557 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
The _rsvg_node_poly_build_path function in rsvg-shapes.c in librsvg before2.40.7 allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service(out-of-bounds heap read) via an odd number of elements in a coordinatepair in an SVG document.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7557` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-rsvg-2.0 - 2.40.13-1
librsvg2-2 - 2.40.13-1
librsvg2-bin - 2.40.13-1
librsvg2-common - 2.40.13-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: librsvg package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.40.13-1').
